column4: How do I see the history of what I've installed/updated with apt-get, Update Manager and various other tools?  Google says it's in Synaptic - File|History, but that's wrong.
Ah! So is it possible to export it to a file?  Stuff that can't be viewed in Emacs isn't really stuff, as far as this old fart is concerned...
there is a file already somewhere, most probably, I just don't know where
